omg this game tho. I played online and killed 2 of the 4. The last two managed to open the gate, so instead of rushing at them, I just stood there and watched. They kept beckoning me to come over and I slowly backed off. They eventually inched towards me. I turned around and let them get as close as they wanted. I slowly turned around and one was right next to me, the other was a little farther off. I moved around and just had some fun, eventually the other joined in. We just danced around for a little until one of them started to destroy the hook. I attacked him, and set him on the ground. He was revived to bleeding and then I attacked and hung the other one. The bleeding one just sat there for a second, about to help, then I attacked and hung him too. I won.

【2020年3月11日更新】
匹配速度令人满意挺多的了，快的话一分钟就能找到比赛。
【2016年9月25日更新】
这个游戏更新之后更优秀了，然而并没有什么用。因为一个多人游戏再出色，匹配不到比赛就没有任何意义。希望制作组能够早点修复找不到比赛的BUG，不然这游戏迟早要完。在修复完之前先差评提醒。

【原本评测】
人称贾乃亮神机妙算，我却笑他毕竟智力不足，倘若在此设下一夹，我等路过，尽将束手就擒矣。 （啪！）这里怎么真有夹子，吾命休矣。
总体而言这是个很不错的多人游戏，战局随时随地充满变数，需要谨慎小心、随机应变，也值得你投入很多时间去研究和体验。人类和屠夫双方的心理博弈是这个游戏最刺激的地方。

I think this is an awesome game. BUt is probably better for more hardcore gamers, it takes a lot a skill that i dont have, it is horror based but could use more. I think it is an overall 4 of 5 stars.

I really do love this game, when i don't have to spam the ready button. But that's not the big issue, my only problem that really bothers me is when i use an item for survivor, like a toolbox. And also use add ons for it. There has been 2 occasions where my toolbox would be held almost sideways by my character and would not work at all. If i survive that match it still takes the toolbox and the add ons i used for it. Considering toolboxes is one of the more rare items to find it's very frustrating to lose one even when you survive and didn't even get to use it. BUT, other than that 20/10 great game love it.

Dead by Daylight ist aufjedenfall ein Spiel was extrem viel Spaß macht, sowohl als Opfer oder als Killer, Vorallem mit Freunde. Trotzdem nervt eine Sache EXTREM...das "Matchmaking" manchmal habe ich das gefühl länger in der Lobby nach einem Spiel zu suchen wie das eigentliche spielen. :( Wenn dieses Problem behoben ist, dann ist es auf jeden fall ein sehr sehr Geiles Spiel!
โครตสนุก ผมเป็นคนชอบแนวนี้แนะนำซื้อมาสิครับสนุก

Also ich persönlich weiß gar nicht, was so viele zu meckern haben. Sicher hat das Spiel noch einige Bugs, aber nichts was jetzt großartig den Spielspaß rauben könnte. Zumindest ist mir noch nichts derartiges passiert wo ich sage, "das spiele ich nicht mehr". Das Lobbysystem ist nicht das beste, das ist richtig, dennoch habe ich z.B. noch nie länger als eine Minute warten müssen bis die Lobby voll war. Die Ladezeiten variieren allerdings manchmal, warum auch immer. Am Balancing der einzelnen Charakter muss auch noch etwas gearbeitet werden. Die Nurse z.B. scheint mir, im Gegensatz zu den anderen Killern, viel zu "schwach" zu sein. Aber gut, sie ist auch erst neu dazugekommen. ^^" Dass jeder Charakter andere Fähigkeiten hat und man ihn beliebig hochleveln und mit verdienten Blutpunkte Items und Perks kaufen kann, finde ich eigentlich ganz gut gelungen, auch wenn nicht erklärt wurde, dass manche Items vor einem Match geopfert bzw. verbrannt werden und somit nach dem Match weg sind. xD Aber Items gekommt man immer wieder und zu hauf. Und alle die meckern, dass nur Killer-Camper unterwegs sind, sorry Leute, aber leider kann das in dem Spiel auch eine Taktik sein - vom Killer, wie auch von den Überlebenden. ;) Dead by Daylight ist eben kein Shooter! Man muss eben wissen wie man vorgehen will. Einfach drauf los spielen is nich! :D Mir macht Dead by Daylight sehr viel Spaß und ich freue mich über jede Verbesserung und jeden Fix und natürlich darüber was da in Zukunft sonst noch so kommt an neuen Maps, Charakteren und Outfits. :) Vor allem mit Freunden macht das Spiel echt Laune! :]
Matchmaking fixed! Now recommended

Ready? 
No. You're not. 

Even if you press the "Ready" button 100 times the game won't start. Matchmaking will put anyone off I'm afraid.

Okay, so, the matchmaking search times have definitely gotten a lot better since 2016 when I first played. You might find some lulls, but even the lulls are not nearly as bad as they used to be. It's a unique multiplayer game, so there might be more of a learning curve than for most. It's a very cooperative experience when playing as a Survivor, and a very strategic slasher experience when playing as a Killer. 

That being said, there are some balance issues that might hinder newcomers. Also, be mindful that the community in this game is quite toxic (maybe like a lot of multiplayer games, but this one I've noticed in particular, so it's worth mentioning). Lots of people like to trash talk and be mean-spirited, so if you really don't like dealing with that, stay the hell away from this and the certain losers that infest it lol. Some people treat this game like it's their life and probably play virtually nothing else.

Tato hra se mi velice líbí je plná napětí a je super na hraní převážně na postřeh o co se starají mini quckTime eventy.Tato hra se mi však zalíbila nejen svou grafikou kterou bych mimochodem přirovnal k The Walking Dead ale i svou hráčskou komunitou která je velmy přátelská.Líbí se mi však to že je čistě na vás či budete lovec nebo lovený(kořist) ale tato hra není jen tak. jak to tav v hrním průmyslu začíná být zvykem tak si vylešujete svou postavu různým parky skilly atd... !SPOILER! ((npř. můžete sabotovat háky na které vás vrah věší)) a tak podobně nejlepší je na tom to že nikdy na tuto hru nejste sami jde čistě o srandu a hráčská komunita této hry je velice vstřícná  ŽE BY SE KOMUNITY ZAČALY MĚNIT??? ael opravdu co je nejdůležitější je to že tuto hru jsem si koupil čistě náhodou a od té doby mě nepustila. jen trochu skřípe ten match making ale to se časem zpraví. u této hry se nestane že za týden nikdo nebude vědět o co jde. proto této hře uděluji 9/10 bodů  proč né 10/10 no to proto že match making opravdu zlobí neni dodělaný a to je dle mého u 99.9 multiplayrové akce špatné jde jen čistě o tuhle věc doporuču ji tuto hru vřele každeému.     minimum requirements:
  

   CPU:	Intel Core i3 4170 or AMD FX-8120
CPU Speed:	Info
RAM:	8 GB
OS:	64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 8 & Windows 8.1)
Video Card:	DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
Free Disk Space:	15 GB.

El juego es un 4 supervivientes vs 1 asesino. Los supervivientes deben cooperar para arreglar unos generadores, escapar y salvarse del asesino.
Según se avanza en el juego se consiguen puntos que mejoran a tus personajes, asi consiguen perks/habilidades que le ayudaran en la supervivencia o en la caza de supervivientes.

El juego ha cambiado y añadido mejoras respecto al principio, más supervivientes, más mapas, más asesinos y nuevas mecanicas.
Actualmente el jugar con amigos como solo no entraña poblemas serios como en el comienzo, que era casi imposible. No obstante tiene unos cuantos bug,  que se van solucionando poco a poco.

El problema del juego son los dlcs de pago que estan empezando a salir,pero no te quita de disfrutar de la esencia del juego.
 
El juego es muy entretenido y es muy recomendable.

The game is great. The experience getting into a game is terrible. 

The premise is very interesting and engaging, and the execution is fairly good. The gameplay is addicting, the progression is solid, and the ranking system is also functional. The only in-game problem is the unit collision, which is so bad that at times you can get kicked with anti-hack if you keep running into another player. It is as if the player interaction box is an invisible sea urchin. The cosmetics for characters also could use some more variation. Aside from that it is great.

Its getting into the game which is the problem. The matchmaking is broken. Finding a game can take upwards of 30 minutes and when you and your friends are required to 'ready up' each 10 seconds to continue searching for a game, it can be extremely frustrating. Currently (Aug 2016), it is at times impossible to get into a game. The queue is non-functional, and you have to re-enter the queue to find a game roughly each 6 seconds. So I do not currently recommend buying the game, as even though the game is good, as in a 7 to 9 out of 10, you will hardly ever be able to get into a game, dragging it down to a 4 or 5 out of 10. 

The settings menu also leaves much to be desired, with only the absolute minimum of settings being available to the user.

It's the best multiplayer horror game available. Think Left for Dead meets Hide and Seek.

The gameplay itself is solid. It's relatively bug free IN-GAME and has the potential for longevity not often seen by similar titles of the same genre. The concept at first seems very simple, but it's the progression that makes each game different. Perks, items and offerings (Once time use bonuses) make every game a unique and enjoyable experience.

The main issue with the game is without a doubt, the absolutely broken matchmaking. Make sure you are willing to press "ready up" every 10 seconds because the game searches and then stops constantly. Seems like a minor issue at first, but if you aren't patient it gets old fast.

But if you can get past the few matchmaking issues the actual game itself is fun. Highly recommend it to anyone who wants to play a horror game that has multiplayer and longevity.
